UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile in the Convo application.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the user profile, from Firebase Auth.

displayName.description: The user's display name, shown in the app.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

lastSeen.description: Timestamp of the user's last activity.

isOnline.description: Boolean indicating whether the user is currently online.

senderId.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

chatId.description: The unique identifier of the chat room the message belongs to.

text.description: The text content of the message.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.

isModerated.description: Indicates whether the message has been moderated.

ChatRoom.title: ChatRoom
ChatRoom.description: Represents a one-to-one chat room between two users.

users.description: Array containing the UIDs of the two users in the chat room.

userDetails.description: Map containing the user profiles of the chat participants.

lastMessage.description: The last message sent in the chat room.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the chat room was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Uses the document ID as the user ID for ownership.

/chats/{chatId}.description: Stores chat room metadata. `users` array defines the members of the chat.

/chats/{chatId}/messages/{messageId}.description: Stores chat messages within chat rooms.
